channel.title: Any one?
channel.description:
Well if any one can redirct me to a link that would be great!
I'm running a standalone [24/7] on cs 1.6 and I'm trying to install Hook mod and EntMod..if anyone can help I'd appreciate it..
I've been googling for ages...and also if you can help me make hook for admins only..thanks

item.title: Any one?
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Yes, counterstrike 1.6. A stand alone server is like a dedicated server except…it runs about 2.5-3x faster. Hook mod is a mood that is basiaclly a rope that lets you swing anywhere you want…except I want it for admins only…and EntMod lets you move anything you want in the game like a box…it’s on the left…you can move it right. I want to no where to place the files. Hope I helped some more.

Read full topic

item.title: Any one?

item.description:
